segments.text: Hi , this is ABC Company . Is that Joseph ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , speaking . Anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am calling to tell you that the interview for you is in our company on Monday morning at 8: 00 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is on the Jianshe Street where there is a Carrefour Supermarket near it .
segments.speaker: S1
